website_summaries.verdict: Some cats will bypass all the supportive foam in the world in favor of a soft and snuggly bed that they can nestle into. If this sounds like your four-legged friend, the enveloping design of this option might just be a perfect fit.
pros: High, soft sides are perfect for snuggling into and offer plenty of security for skittish cats
Raised back is overstuffed for extra support
Low front acts as a headrest and makes it easy for cats to get in and out
Self-heating Sherpa fabric is warm and moldable
The whole bed can be tossed into the washing machine
cons: Not as supportive as others on our list
Some owners think that the back and sides are too floppy, but cats seem to love it for the same reason
